verses.verse: "You shall not <S%H5375>spread<s%> a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H8088>report.<s%> <S%H7896>Don't<s%> join your <S%H3027>hand<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> to be a <S%H2555>malicious<s%> <S%H5707>witness.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H310>follow<s%> a <S%H7227>crowd<s%> to do <S%H7451>evil;<s%> neither shall you <S%H6030>testify<s%> in <S%H7379>court<s%> to <S%H5186>side<s%> <S%H310>with<s%> a <S%H7227>multitude<s%> to pervert <S%H5186>justice;<s%>
neither shall you <S%H1921>favor<s%> a <S%H1800>poor<s%> man in his <S%H7379>cause.<s%>

"If you <S%H6293>meet<s%> your <S%H341>enemy<s%>'s <S%H7794>ox<s%> or his <S%H2543>donkey<s%> going <S%H8582>astray,<s%> you shall <S%H7725>surely<s%> bring it <S%H7725>back<s%> to him <S%H7725>again.<s%>

If you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2543>donkey<s%> of him who <S%H8130>hates<s%> you fallen <S%H7257>down<s%> under his <S%H4853>burden,<s%> <S%H2308>don't<s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> <S%H5800>him,<s%> you shall surely help him with <S%H5800>it.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H5186>deny<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> to your <S%H34>poor<s%> people in their <S%H7379>lawsuits.<s%>

"Keep <S%H7368>far<s%> from a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H1697>charge,<s%> and <S%H2026>don't<s%> kill the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> and <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> for I will not <S%H6663>justify<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

"You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> no <S%H7810>bribe,<s%> for a <S%H7810>bribe<s%> <S%H5786>blinds<s%> those who have <S%H6493>sight<s%> and <S%H5557>perverts<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H3905>oppress<s%> an <S%H1616>alien,<s%> for you <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H5315>heart<s%> of an <S%H1616>alien,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> you were <S%H1616>aliens<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
"For <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H776>land,<s%> and shall <S%H622>gather<s%> in its <S%H8393>increase,<s%>

but the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> year you shall let it <S%H8058>rest<s%> and <S%H5203>lie<s%> <S%H34>fallow,<s%> that the poor of your <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H398>eat;<s%> and what they <S%H3499>leave<s%> the <S%H2416>animal<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H398>eat.<s%> In the same <S%H6213>way,<s%> you shall deal with your <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> and with your olive <S%H2132>grove.<s%>

<S%H8337>"Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> your <S%H4639>work,<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7673>rest,<s%> that your <S%H7794>ox<s%> and your <S%H2543>donkey<s%> may have <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of your <S%H519>handmaid,<s%> and the <S%H1616>alien<s%> may be <S%H5314>refreshed.<s%>

"Be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to do all things that I have <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2142>you;<s%> and don't invoke the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> neither let them be <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5921>out<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
"You shall observe a <S%H2287>feast<s%> to me <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7272>times<s%> a <S%H8141>year.<s%>

You shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread.<s%> <S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> as I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4150>you,<s%> at the time appointed in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib<s%> (for in it you came <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>), and no one shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H7387>empty.<s%>

And the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of your <S%H4639>labors,<s%> which you <S%H2232>sow<s%> in the <S%H7704>field:<s%> and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H614>harvest,<s%> at the <S%H3318>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year,<s%> when you <S%H622>gather<s%> in your <S%H4639>labors<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
<S%H7969>Three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> all your <S%H2138>males<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H2076>offer<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> with leavened <S%H2557>bread,<s%> neither shall the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of my <S%H2282>feast<s%> <S%H3885>remain<s%> all night until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

The <S%H7225>first<s%> of the first <S%H1061>fruits<s%> of your <S%H127>ground<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> "You shall not <S%H1310>boil<s%> a young <S%H1423>goat<s%> in its <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

<S%H7971>"Behold,<s%> I send an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8104>you,<s%> to keep you by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and to <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H4725>place<s%> which I have <S%H3559>prepared.<s%>

Pay <S%H8104>attention<s%> <S%H6440>to<s%> <S%H8085>him,<s%> and listen to his <S%H6963>voice.<s%> <S%H4843>Don't<s%> provoke <S%H5375>him,<s%> for he will not pardon your <S%H6588>disobedience,<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%> is in <S%H7130>him.<s%>

But if you <S%H8085>indeed<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> all that I <S%H1696>speak,<s%> then I will be an <S%H340>enemy<s%> to your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and an <S%H6887>adversary<s%> to your <S%H6696>adversaries.<s%>

For my <S%H4397>angel<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H935>you,<s%> and bring you in to the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite;<s%> and I will cut them <S%H3582>off.<s%>

You shall not bow <S%H7812>down<s%> to their <S%H430>gods,<s%> nor <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H6213>them,<s%> nor follow their <S%H4639>practices,<s%> but you shall <S%H2040>utterly<s%> <S%H2040>overthrow<s%> them <S%H7665>and<s%> <S%H7665>demolish<s%> their <S%H4676>pillars.<s%>

You shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and he will <S%H1288>bless<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> and your <S%H4325>water,<s%> and I will <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H4245>sickness<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from your <S%H7130>midst.<s%>
No one will <S%H7921>miscarry<s%> or be <S%H6135>barren<s%> in your <S%H776>land.<s%> I will <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of your <S%H3117>days.<s%>

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> my <S%H367>terror<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2000>you,<s%> and will confuse all the <S%H5971>people<s%> to whom you <S%H935>come,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> turn their backs to <S%H6203>you.<s%>

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H6880>hornet<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1644>you,<s%> which will drive out the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> from before <S%H6440>you.<s%>

I will not drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> you in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> lest the <S%H776>land<s%> become <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and the <S%H2416>animals<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> multiply against <S%H7227>you.<s%>
<S%H4592>Little<s%> by <S%H4592>little<s%> I will drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6509>you,<s%> until you have increased and <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

I will <S%H7896>set<s%> your <S%H1366>border<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> even to the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and from the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to the <S%H5104>River;<s%> for I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and you shall drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> before <S%H6440>you.<s%>
You shall <S%H3772>make<s%> no <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H430>them,<s%> nor with their gods.

They shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> lest they make you <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H5647>me,<s%> for if you serve their <S%H430>gods,<s%> it will surely be a snare to <S%H4170>you.<s%>"
